title: One Rep Max Calculator
description: Calculate your one-repetition maximum (1RM) for weightlifting
metaDescription: Free One Rep Max Calculator - Estimate your maximum lift capacity using 7 proven formulas including Epley, Brzycki, and more.

info.title: About One Rep Max
info.description: One Rep Max (1RM) is the maximum amount of weight you can lift for a single repetition of a given exercise. This calculator uses seven different formulas to estimate your 1RM based on the weight lifted and number of repetitions performed.
info.note: These formulas are most accurate for 1-10 reps. Always warm up properly and use a spotter when attempting maximum lifts.
